reqs:
Pre-reqs: (SPPH 400, SPPH 502)
Co-reqs: (SPPH 500)
Equivalents: OBS 507
Classroom location: BC Women and Children's Hospital - check schedule for classroom
Note: For non-SPPH students, please contact the instructor and visit http://spph.ubc.ca/courses/graduate-courses/visiting-students/.
description: Indicators of maternal/newborn well-being across population subgroups, changing trends in obstetrical intervention, perinatal morbidity, and the analysis of perinatal data.
